issue.title: [Python] test_plasma could make errors more diagnosable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2271](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2271). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, when `plasma_store` fails for a reason or another, you get poorly readable errors from `test_plasma.py`. Displaying the child process' stderr would help.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2271?focusedCommentId=16387658) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Sorry for this erroneous report. stderr **is** displayed by py.test (it is simply passed through from the child to the parent). I blame looking at two bugs at once :-)
